title: (S.I. No. 198 of 2002) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the
heading: 2. The European Communities (Seed of Fodder Plants) Regulations 2002
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Seed of Fodder Plants) Regulations 2002 
(S.I. No. 198 of 2002) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the 
definition of “Directive” (as amended by the European Communities (Seed of 
Fodder Plants) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No.198 of 2020)) the 
following: 

“’Directive’ means Council Directive 66/401/EEC of 14 June 1966 on the 
marketing of fodder plant seed2 (as amended by Council Directive 69/63/EEC 
of 18 February 19693, Council Directive 71/162/EEC of 30 March 19714, 
Council Directive 72/274/EEC of 20 July 19725, Council Directive 72/418/EEC 
of 6 December 19726, Council Directive 73/438/EEC of 11 December 19737, 
Council Directive 75/444/EEC of 26 June 19758, Council Directive 78/55/EEC 
of 19 December 19779, First Commission Directive 78/386/EEC of 18 April 
197810, Council Directive 78/692/EEC of 25 July 197811, Council Directive 
78/1020/EEC of 5 December 197812, Commission Directive 79/641/EEC of 27 
June 197913, Council Directive 79/692/EEC of 24 July 197914, Commission 
Directive 80/754/EEC of 17 July 198015, Commission Directive 81/126/EEC of 
16 February 198116, Commission Directive 82/287/EEC of 13 April 198217,

title: (S.I. No. 198 of 2002) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the
heading: 3. The European Communities (Seed of Fodder Plants) (Amendment)
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Seed of Fodder Plants) (Amendment) 

Regulations 2020 (S.I. No.198 of 2018) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 June, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [315] 5
text_norm: 3 european community (seed fodder plants) (amendment) regulation 2020 (s.i no.198 2018) revoked given official seal 25 june 2021 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine 315 5

title: (S.I. No. 198 of 2002) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2021/415 by amending the definitions contained in Directive 
66/402/EEC as they relate to the botanic names given to certain varieties of hard 
fescue and couch grass together with names of wheat, durum wheat, spelt wheat, 
sorghum and Sudan grass. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [315]
